comment.author: 69859130@N05
comment._content: This B-25 served with the 90th squadron of the 3rd Bomb Group. It is 5th AF, not 7th AF. It was converted to a strafer.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/69859130@N05] Thank you for that correction! Let us know if you find any others.
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
